name: Golden Troupe
description:
End Phase: If the character to which this is attached is on standby, this card gains 2 "Recompense" point. (Max 4 points)
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: For each "Recompense" point this card has, consume it to spend 1 less Elemental Die.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

storytitle: Surpassing the Ancient Dream: Golden Troupe
storytext:
"Abide until that day... Abide until that day...
When every member of the Golden Troupe shall win the whole future as their prize."
